narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Neurointernational Healthcare LLC is a Rehabilitation Hospital provider based in Sarasota, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $34.9M in Medicaid payments across 46K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $34.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
